Text: See? How come you're the only one who's uploaded this movie with the English subs? Everyone else doesn't even have the English subs! You are the fucken best!

I watched the movie. It is crappy and boring. When in shooting scenes approx 30 shots are fired from an clear shot angle (no obstacles, straight, enough time etc) and not a single bullets hits the target you can speak of bullshit. Which the movie is.

A: 9 (troubles with MPlayer makes -1)
V: 10
